Art Center -
+3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and an extra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] with the discovery of Refrigeration. Provides 1 [ICON_RES_CRAYON] Crayons, a luxury resource which cannot be obtained any other way. -
A reliable source of crayons is the most important part of a fairy community; without it, it's not even a community, it's just a bunch of fairies who happen to be in one place. The childish fairies use crayon drawings to express themselves as individuals and as part of a community: drawing self-portraits to identify their homes, illustrating neat things they want to try and make, or recording their accomplishments in picture form. The sight of the autumn fairies returning from the forest, beaming with pride, holding crayon rubbings of all the cool leaves they made that day, is enough to move even the most cynical observers to say "Awwww..." -
The Art Center is Cirno's unique building, replacing the Amphitheater. Unlike the Amphitheater, it provides the unique luxury resource "Crayons", increasing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire. As additional instances of a luxury resource don't provide the same benefit, it's best to trade extra Crayons with other empires, to obtain luxuries you have no access to. With the discovery of Refrigeration, the Art Center provides additional [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, the reason for which should hopefully be obvious.
